title: Oreo Oration FAQ, Video Response Compilation, Thank You Video
description:
We've been reviewing Oreo cookies for quite some time. Now, Oreo Oration answers your burning questions, shows you the best video responses so far, and gives you a great big "thanks."

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your Oreo review as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

Today's special episode featured the following Video Responses. Go watch them!

ArmyGuns89: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GiYyhL3mKkQ

altoman107: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wYuhyMU4TCg

Blaire Byhower: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9gHadM-s1I

CptOppositional: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ok0_3tjXk34

grambofirstblood: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2HBXW_8ueg

MrRepzion: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXvEFKJXoc0

NIcklaus West: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-0S9aQtOSaY

reallygraceful: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hdKkabURHxU

Taner Durusu: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fdn6Yzz-qF4

theknapkins: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6RhH__FKDU

Whatthetechchannel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=05ia-tQxJ8g

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a very special non-episode of Oreo Oration I'm GameOverGreggy and of course this is Oreo Oration a show where I review every different type of Oreo here in these United States I wanted to do a quick Monday video for you not don't worry you're still getting your Wednesday and Friday episode of Oreo Oration but I just wanted to drop your line and say thank you so much for supporting the show uh obviously we are up into the teens now of episodes we still have a lot more Oreos to come a lot of more a lot more Oreos are coming uh your support has been overwhelming I want to thank you for all the views all the comments all the video responses I'm going to link to a bunch of them here at the end and show some clips from them thank you so much for putting those in but I wanted to drop a line you know we're we're getting ready to film the second giant bunch I get the same questions every time we come up on Oreo Oration though so I wanted to tackle some of those

but I wanted to drop a line, you know we're getting ready to film the second giant bunch. I get the same questions every time we come up on Oreo Oration, though, so I wanted to tackle some of those. I wanted to thank them so much for their support in that one instance because question number one on the Oreo FAQ is submitted by Bill Nolan: "Are you sponsored by Oreo?" No, everybody, a lot of a lot of questions about this, I guess understandably so. I do this all in my free time, uh I buy the cookies and I make the video for you then I put it up, uh Oreo does not sponsor me. I'm not an Oreo hater if they want me real quick. Oreo's watching: "Do you want me to sell out?" Done? You want me to if you want to pay me to review your Oreos, I'm hands down but no money is exchanged hands here.

an Oreo hat if they want me real quick Oreos watching you want me to sell out done you want me to if you want to pay me to review your Oreos I'm hands down but no no money is exchanged hands here between me and or so don't worry about that these are unbiased audio reviews question number two that's frequently asked this comes from uh Gameplays Gus gamer why cookie review that's a good that's a good point why so if I'm not sponsored by Oreo why do I review cookies uh a lot of you know me I I work at a website called IGN.com Monday through Friday I want to do something in my spare time to be creative I searched for an outlet for a long long time and I went to this uh thing called VidCon YouTuber conference and uh I was there to you know learn more about YouTube in general but also promote up at noon show over on YouTube IGN youtube.com/ go go there watch it every Monday me and Brian Ellicano and uh it was one of those things I left there so inspired I wanted to start creating my own

up at noon show over on YouTube IGN youtube.com/ go go there watch it every Monday me and Brian Ellyn (Elon Musk) and uh it was one of those things I left there so inspired I wanted to start creating my own content and I have this idea for a show that I wasn't ready to create yet I didn't have the skills the edit capacity I didn't know what I'd be doing making the video doing all that stuff so I did a conversation with Colin then I started Oreo try to get my chops up and do something you know just for me that I can create try to create content share it with people like yourself another question I get a lot not another question I get a lot there in the comments this time it's from Brean 2 he says reduced fat he's referring to me reviewing the reduced fat Oreos no I will not do that that is not an Oreo cookie that is a joke someone is playing on everyone so no I will never review the reduced fat Oreo stop asking for it another question Jared he writes and he says why does Greg always use the Palm
